text: Allan Stig Rasmussen (born 20 November 1983) is a Danish chess grandmaster. He is a four-time Danish Chess Champion. ==Chess career== Born in 1983, Rasmussen earned his international master title in 2008 and his grandmaster title in 2009.2nd quarter Presidential Board 2009, 15-18 June 2009, Krakow, POL FIDE He has won the Danish Chess Championship in 2010, 2011, 2014 and 2019.15-årigt skaktalent bliver Danmark yngste stormester ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Chess grandmasters Category:Danish chess players Category:Sportspeople from Aarhus
title: Allan Stig Rasmussen
